#summary Development Road Map for BigBlueButton


= Current Release =

The current release is BigBlueButton 0.80.  See the [ReleaseNotes release notes] for details on updates to the current release.


== Release 0.81 ==
Development of !BigBlueButton 0.81 is underway.  The focus is the following features:

  # Capturing all activity in the presentation window for playback ([http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1191 1191])
  # Support for students with disabilities ([http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=853 853])
  # Layout manager ([http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1060 1060])
  # H.264 video encoding ([http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=640 640])

We are also working on integrating [PollingModule Polling module] as a core module.

A link to the recording for the committers meeting (held 2012-05-18) that discusses the above features is available here <a href="https://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/browse_thread/thread/e8cf67597405678f">here</a>.


While we don't give out release dates (we release on quality, not dates), you can tell when we enter our testing phase (and getting close to a release) by subscribing to the [http://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/topics?gvc=2 bigbluebutton-dev] mailing list.

= Roadmap to !BigBlueButton 1.0 =

We have Big plans for !BigBlueButton.  To get a look at the plans beyond the current iteration, see [RoadMap1dot0 Roadmap to BigBlueButton 1.0].
